description: Put a twist on the classic Aperol spritz with this fruity cocktail recipe, perfect for summery alfresco dining.
name: Spritz With Raspberry Syrup & Mint Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the raspberry sugar syrup, place raspberries, sugar and 1 cup cold water in a small saucepan and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes to allow flavours to infuse. Strain syrup through a sieve, pressing down with the back of a spoon into a heatproof jug. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until chilled.

To serve, combine Aperol, prosecco and soda in a bottle or jug. Place ice cubes, an orange slice, raspberries and mint sprigs into each glass. Pour 30ml raspberry sugar syrup into each glass, top up with Aperol mixture and serve.
